description:
Badgers protect an island.  Fukusuke becomes the god of blessing.  Acolytes at a temple are jealous of a smart dog.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Notojima no Mujina / Fuku no Kami no Fukusuke-san / Shiro to Kobouzu
The Badgers of Noto Island / Fukusuke-san, the God of Blessing / Shiro and the Little Kid
能登島のむじな / 福の神の福助さん / しろと小坊主
